channel.title: Quantum Architectures on Aniruddha Bapat
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum Architectures on Aniruddha Bapat

item.title: Design and Optimization in Near-Term Quantum Computation
Entanglement bounds on the performance of quantum computing architectures
item.description: In this paper, we show that a quantity known as the isoperimetric number establishes a lower bound on the time required to create highly entangled states.

item.title: Unitary entanglement construction in hierarchical networks
item.description: We present numerical and analytical results on the speed at which large entangled states can be created on nearest-neighbor grids and hierarchy graphs. We also present a scheme for performing circuit placement on hierarchical quantum architectures.
